oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hādhā kitāb al-Iʻlām tārīkh Bayt Allāh al-Ḥarām wa-al-niṣf al-thānī Tawārīkh Āl ʻUthmān / taʼlīf Shaykh al-Islām al-Shaykh Quṭb al-Dīn al-Makkī : manuscript, undated
Kitāb al-Iʻlām bi-aʻlām tārīkh Bayt Allāh al-Ḥarām
Tārīkh Makka
Histoire de La Mecque
Iʻlām bi-aʻlām Bayt Allāh al-Ḥarām
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Nahrawālī, Muḥammad ibn Aḥmad , -1580 or 1581
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Widener Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bound in half leather and boards.
Written in Naskhi hand, in one column, 25 lines per page, in black and red.
بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم وبه الاعانه الحمد لله الذي جعل المسجد الحرام مثابة للناس وامنا وامر بتظهير الكعبة البيت الحرام... :Incipit
والحمد لله رب العالمين والصلوة والسلام ليتمان الاكملان على سيد الانبيا والمرسلين وعلى آله وصحبه... :Colophon
The auhtor finished his writing on 7 Rabīʻ al-Awwal 985 AH [May 25, 1577 AD] (f. 202r).
Cream laid paper with watermarks. 20.2 x 14.7 cm. (15 x 8.5 cm.)
MS Arab SM172. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
